pages.text: $(li)The Cold Ocean is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Ocean$(/l) that can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The surface of this place is composed mainly by Gravel blocks.$(br)$(li)You can find some water vegetation too, like Seagrass and Kelp Plants.

$(li)Some aquatic creatures survives in this cold waters, like $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/orca)Orcas$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/cachalot_whale)Cachalot Whales$(/l), Salmons, Cods and $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/squid)Squids$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Cold Ocean$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
